segments.text: Is there a lot of snow in this region at this time of the year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the snow is often falling thick and fast here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think I like it . I appreciate the snow very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , It's really so beautiful with all the things covered by snow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , where can I go ski ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are so many places around . Take a look at the advertisement .
segments.speaker: S2
